column4: after typeing "sudo dpkg -filename.deb" i get an error that dpkg: conflicting actions --field and --install
You need to type sudo dpkg -i filename.deb
I've dropped by #ubuntu-ops and left them a message.
you two are still having marital issues ? :)

the ops changed their tone. I'm feeling more than a little hard done by here. He's been totally impolite and outright incorrect, and some op has just validated the way he acted and told me to drop it.
Yeah, I only told him what I know from past experience. I was humble thoughout, and as soon as I was told otherwise by an op I didn't argue >.<
Personally I don't think he's got me on /ignore at all.
